about_the_game: Locked in a military prison for crimes they did not commit, the 4 members of the Escape team must work out how to break free from an Escape proof military prison.  Maybe the rumours that the compound houses the fiercest tank in history will help?

  • OS: Minimum Ubuntu - 12.04; Recommended Ubuntu - 14.04
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.4 gHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000, Nvidia GeForce 8000, ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Linux Compatible Card
